content:
{{knowledge objective
|Identifiant=OIC-230-01-A
|Item_parent=Acute chest pain
|Item_parent_short=Acute chest pain
|Rank=A
|Title=Know the definition of acute chest pain
|Description=None
|Rubric=Definition
|Contributors=Vincent Roule
|Order=1}}
'''Know the definition of acute chest pain'''

<nowiki/>= pain (or discomfort) in the region of the rib cage (between the neck and the umbilicus) occurring suddenly.

Variable characteristics: intensity, location, irradiation, duration, triggering or relieving factor, frequency.

properties.question: What is the definition of acute chest pain?
properties.option_a: Persistent discomfort in the chest region that develops over several weeks.
properties.option_b: Pain in the rib cage that occurs suddenly and can vary in intensity.
properties.option_c: A chronic condition characterized by a dull ache in the chest that is not related to the rib cage region.
properties.option_d: A mild, non-specific discomfort in the chest area that is typically associated with relaxation.
